title: Maharani Kundan Haaram with Regal Sapphire Pendant
features: This stunning haaram features intricate Kundan work, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. The floral and paisley motifs, a hallmark of traditional South Indian design, are beautifully rendered with exceptional detail. The centerpiece is a magnificent sapphire pendant surrounded by cascading gold balls, creating a truly regal and sophisticated look. Features a central pendant. The necklace has an adjustable dori closure.
colors: Touches of Red (Rubies or other small accents)
occasions: Important festivals like Diwali and Sankranthi
description: Experience the epitome of South Indian elegance with this exquisite Kundan Haaram. The meticulous craftsmanship, coupled with the brilliance of the Kundan stones and the allure of the deep blue sapphires, makes this piece a true heirloom. It represents a timeless tradition of Indian jewelry-making and will be cherished for generations. Perfect for the bride who desires to make a statement of regal grace.
